long_description: This summer, be cool, comfy and eco-friendly when you wear the Royal Robbins Chambray Summertime Dress made from hemp and organic cotton. Garment-washed slub fabric feels soft and offers subtle texture. Hemp offers natural anti-microbial properties to reduce odor; organic cotton is breathable and easy-care, and grown without the use of toxic pesticides. Styling features a V-neck in front and peek-a-boo keyhole in back. Gathers and darts shape the fit. Chambray Summertime Dress from Royal Robbins features generous hand pockets with curved openings.
short_description: This summer, be cool, comfy and eco-friendly when you wear the Royal Robbins Chambray Summertime Dress made from hemp and organic cotton.
